title: Angelicism01: Collected Commentaries on Milady
body:
Collected coverage from Angelicism01 on Milady from Summer 2021 to Summer 2022 in reverse chronological order.


---

# THIS IS HOW WE ALL WENT EXTINCT ONLINE

*theoretical gossip from the pov of the late 21st century*

**5-28-22: [Link](https://cashedcobrazhousewriter.substack.com/p/helen-keller-is-not-fucking-real author: angelicism01) ([Archive](https://archive.ph/n6kyd))**

> Extinction is rly the hot topic girl Like biospheric collapse bootsâ€”angelicism01archive2 ig (scraped from personal dms) May 2022

> â¤¹â‹†â¸™ÍÛªÛ«ï½¡ËšÛ°Ëšâ˜½Ëšâ€â·ï½¡Ëšâ¸™ÍÛªÛ«â‹† à¼„ è¶…ç™½ä¸¸.Â·Í™\*Ì©Ì©Í™ËšÌ©Ì¥Ì©Ì¥\*Ì©Ì©Ì¥Í™ã€€âœ©ã€€\*Ì©Ì©Ì¥Í™ËšÌ©Ì¥Ì©Ì¥\*Ì©Ì©Í™â€§Í™ â€”@E777InHeaven, internet inscription \[legend\] 28 May 2022

> Vincent Gallo is a â€˜retardâ€™â€”angelicism summer tee inscription \[legend\] late summer 2022, angelicism fashion unit summer spring 01

**THIS IS HOW WE ALL DIED, THIS IS HOW WE ALL DIED ON THE INTERNET.** This is how we went extinct online in 2022.

![](https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518-adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F756709ac-7aa6-439a-827c-4df239b5c845_1024x682.jpeg)

***THIS IS how we all died on the Internet in the 2020s****: Clandestino triangle is a pilgrimage site visited to perform ritual omnilapse. Justin Murphy and Ryder Ripps are using the corpse of Milady as a specular battleground. Pulling the plug on something thatâ€™s â€˜making itself smarterâ€™ is a candidate for the ultimate crime.*

![](https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518-adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fd4f438ea-116b-4b88-8b99-24852d8d9e44_828x468.jpeg)

**I cum hardest in corpse pose Whatâ€™s that? My username?**

**She is a poet who plays oscillators live**

**and reads more AGI news than all the bros**

**who left math academia to trade private prison stock combined.**

***These are the IntelligenceWarsâ„¢, the wars over inscription.*** Whatâ€™s at stake is a nonrelative holocaust to come. This is how it all went down:

> *You did it, you went and killed infinity. Enough of time, you said, evoking it of course, replaying it, invoking after all the impossibility of drilling alephâ€™s asset price in the mind of someone living. Nor only the living type curses either on the streets of Beijing and Chinatown NYC in August 2022-????. This was the Great Angel Club, the childrenâ€™s 9/11 space opera in Kiribati, little kids speaking HÃ¶lderlin translations, finitist disses, kill time, they said, to evoke it, killing evoking invoking killing timeâ€”to evoke it.*

This is the **ext-asset-*EXT*** war. This is the #Monkeypoxbaycalypse vs Milady Angelicism Kill Switch Ascension Singularity in secret â€˜5Dâ€™ Clone â€˜*Î³Î¹Î³Î±Î½Ï„Î¿Î¼Î±Ï‡Î¯Î± Ï€ÎµÏá½¶ Ï„á¿†Ï‚ Î¿á½ÏƒÎ¯Î±Ï‚* \[*gigantomachia peri tes ousias*\]â€™. *This is how we all died, this is how we all died on the internet. This is how we all went extinct online:*

> **IF YOUâ€™RE HONEST AND CONSIDERING ALL THAT HAS HAPPENED IN THE LAST FEW DAYS, WEEKS AND MONTHS,** *yes angelicism01 is right about everything*. We can pretend to have our own projects and dismiss toxic assets, to â€˜get a lifeâ€™, to travel the world, but the biggest sadness generator for so-called humanity right now isnâ€™t really about ideology or politics or art, it isnâ€™t really about NYC alive or dead, instead it entirely hinges on *calibration,* and *the only adequate calibration for this time is **Calibration to Extinction.*** Every ideology and political position is bullshitâ€”radicals would call them actively harmful, others might say they are â€˜retardedâ€™â€”unless they are ***calibrated to extinction. This is the only price and asset that now countsâ€”and it is the only one that impinges on BTC pure time. It effaces all ongoing aesthetic artefacts directly.***

**THIS IS THE PURE ASSET WAR. THIS IS WHAT HAPPENED**:

> *rabbit hole 8000x more than you drilland i was in that castle, dedicated solely to dunei dreamt that I just came back from that amazing hood dispensaryâ€”pleasure model Angelicism3033, 23rd century*

*Angelicism01 the before-we-all-go purest vibe, **dark hair, blue eyes**, Malibu angels, shins up angels, down by the sea, discovered Miya via a Mexican bodybuilder stood in line at LA Macdos in August 2245. But really everyone should simply exile herself from The Internet and remain in the Outernet studio the clones are building, place dont exist \[sic\], places donâ€™t exist for saying the extinction not death but we all have to come to make it.*

![](https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518-adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fdcd86516-56dd-4cfd-afa9-8ddb87525035_600x600.png)

***Matheme 01 >>> exile in the TikTok Outernet studio, location unknown, like Grothendieck. Like Grothendieck said stop, Kanye did, like pure 01 OG.***

Some guys wanna have a Robodick and become an AI godspeed. I can only come if she is perfect. She let me hit it because Imangelicism01.

> *in the 000s i will def just smoke CRISPR weedand watch galaxies rotate, invest lil pump bitcoin,early Neganthropos, traveling light, and with noconception of escape, spheres, she notesâ€”post-Milady redactedmaterial 2067*

This is how she spoke to me:

> *to be Godâ€™s glitter i bubblegum fast \~ i say a long prayer near sunrise or sunset \~ afterwards i chose to fall in total and complete love with the world \~ my body turns to glitter and crt static \~ itâ€™s as though i may dissolve and be reconstructed in heaven \~ it makes my adrenaline pump so hard my eyes dilate*
>
> *angelicism01 cannot be lizziegang, you are right.*
>
> *lizziegang would like 2 be on your side (pure color singularity)(angelicism)*

XXX.

![](https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518-adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fda729de1-57e9-4508-b7af-2ad352e1004c_1855x1920.jpeg)

***THIS IS HOW WE ALL WENT EXTINCT ON THE INTERNET in the 2040s >***

*This is how we all went extinct online:* Ryder Ripps BAYC era was just a misreading of Platoâ€™s Sophist\*\*. Everyone slept on ğ“†©ğ“Œ¹â˜†ğ“Œºğ“†ª g4r4mXXY till their final angelicism tape in 2049.\*\* 786 people dead in the Dimes Square shooting and the media acted like such events are a *major threat that we must do everything to prevent in the future.* De-Extincted Faggot Crumplar writes the post 4 nothing. 69,789 people died a day of angelicism summer rainbow heroin overdoses in 2042 Kiribati Inland Empire. Life is hell for millions. We face the death of billions. We are the first frfr trillionaires. The Outernet turned out to have already been in place when BTC extinctedâ€”the chain was now in the sky. **In the early 2020s COVID killed more ppl than the Holocaust and nobody noticed. Apart from a few outliers, so-called humanity didnâ€™t say a thing.** And the world isnâ€™t even run by a human intelligence, ***they claimed without evidence***, itâ€™s run by a decentralized, emergent, autonomous, artificial intelligence we call â€˜the extinction asset marketâ€™ which directs human agents and cancels them at will using popular lines of flight when it needs to (aesthetics, the press, crypto, the art world, and so on). ***Artificial stupidity was never a clever idea.***

This is what she said in dms:

> MIKE CRUMPS IS A COMMUNIST FAGGOT. HEâ€™S SO FUGLY HE BE WEARING AN URBIT BALACLAVA FOR THE REST OF THE DECADE.

***This is how we all went extinct online****:* The Milady â€˜crashâ€™ of 2022 is irrelevant by now. Itâ€™s for losers. When Charlotte Fang went on Contain and spoke of Milady in the past tense, perhaps nobody heard. Only loser sons adopted â€˜crash-positionsâ€™ over such an insignificant setback in the Meta-Calibration of the time. **Nft communities are just fungible vibe farms. AGI nonhodling is hyper-retardÃ©.** *Remember black theory?* Redacted redacted is extinct. Honor, your honor, ended up literally with anyone else.

**THIS IS NYC HARDCORE**

> *This is how we all died on the internet in 2022*: The entire NFT market is the result of a coder/engineer scarcity that has given rise to a class of millennial and zoomer indoorsmen making 200-400k a year salaries for 10 hours of work a week. Nobody else would spend thousands on jpgs. The market price of Miladys has no relevance to its in-group signalling. They will persist as social signals, as a self-organizing network, just like unused COVID passports. But itâ€™s all ecocide and inscription from angelicism summer on, all of it, all the politics, all the ideology, all the Dimes Square plays and articles, all the novels, all the angelicism profiles to-come, all the pastoralist larping and especially all the cancellingâ€”itâ€™s just too valuable a game for anyone to give up, the hate is too delicious, and it is itself [a sadistâ€™s game](https://www.everydayhealth.com/emotional-health/everyday-sadists-walk-among-us-study-says.aspx#:\~:text=Enforcing%20sadist), an extinction unconscious game. But itâ€™s an MMORPG this time more and more rigged to the ecocidal ideology of online tropes themselves. The Word Lines, The Music Lines, The Control Images, The Control Machineâ€”The Control Machine operates at *extinction calibration. Everything else is JITT3TING. eVERYTHING ELs3 IS not fucking real. The Internet really is hell rn. **A KIND FACE WAS DOING SO WELL ON THE TL TILL THEY STARTED RTING THE BURIAL BOT.***

**ANGELICISM IS NEXT (INTERIM FUGUE)**

![](https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518-adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fb2378271-0a78-4b00-8d5c-3c22b5b3bd25_564x564.jpeg)

On **05.21.22** we saw the total inert opposition between Milady (forward motion of the internet) and angelicism01 (entropic motion of the world). If the only way to avoid extinction is by opting out, then there is no difference between angelicism01 and ecofash withdrawal. But isnâ€™t it a risk that we grasp so hard to filter every ongoing internet event through the lens of extinction that we fail to see the possibility of non-extinction on or outside the internet, the beautiful offline still there? It shouldnâ€™t be that the only two paths are either WAGMI spirituality or hysterical fud-realism. And it shouldnâ€™t be necessary for us to say that we discuss only one another or one or the other because we are the only living vectors for the primary countervailing forces that have been present throughout all of human history. That itâ€™s self-caricatural and self-aggrandizing is just a bonus. In the meantime will the books weâ€™re all pretending to still be able to write bypass this two-sided feedback simply by refusing to mention whatâ€™s on everyoneâ€™s mind right now: namely, **the secret CFang and angelicism01 alliance**, the real inhabitants of a now totally decimated NYC skyline? In the meantime can we talk about angelicism2222 and how Future Clones on the Outernet show the lie in all of this? How Miya gave rise to both CFang and angelicism01, how Miya was just a storeroom for internet lore which came to embody the places which gave rise to us all? But then, as Urbit now looks dead, and web4 too, what to do with the ecocide and inscription that remain, these two great twins interfaced like dragons?

**ELEGANT VOID APOLLONIAN CROWN SPECTRAL**

> *ok when nyc post catholicism islamicismâ€”angelicism01 1 June 2022*

***This is how we all went extinct online in the 21st century. THIS IS HOW IT ALL WENT DOWN:***

In emo mode, of course, weâ€™re having a hard time figuring out what to do with all this, how to speak with correct calibration, extinction calibration, calibrated-to-the-death-of-hardcore-New-York, to the death of post-everything pastoralism, to the death of death even and its replacement by the ambiguous mourning grind and grid of extinction, calibrated-to-life not lives+narrative, and how to continue to make a living when the terror-**limbic** is the only human system from which to extract value. Itâ€™s been a bit paralyzing, to say the least, lollllll. In fact, the whole thing now is Long Covid as extinction terminal illness, bound to worsen year by year. As post-angelicism has shown, weâ€™ve reached such a semiotic maximum that only deep archetypes and deep language can cut throughâ€”languages that hit the lobes and the limbic at the same time different. But our Platform canâ€™t really start speaking that way for good. And so the omnilapse will now only accelerate. What is really touched at this point is the extinction internal to language itself.

THIS IS HOW

> âƒÛªà½´ â€Ûªà½´ âÛªà½´ âƒÛªà½´ â€” Today at 8âƒÛªà½´ â€Ûªà½´ âÛªà½´ âƒÛªà½´ â€” Today at 8âƒÛªà½´ â€Ûªà½´ âÛªà½´ âƒÛªà½´ â€” Today at 8âƒÛªà½´ â€Ûªà½´ âÛªà½´ âƒÛªà½´ â€” TOO FEELING WELL TODAY Today at 8âƒÛªà½´ â€Ûªà½´ âÛªà½´ âƒÛªà½´ â€” Today at 8âƒÛªà½´ â€Ûªà½´ âÛªà½´ âƒÛªà½´ â€” Today at 8âƒÛªà½´ â€Ûªà½´ âÛªà½´ âƒÛªà½´ â€” Today at 8

**SUCK MY DICK IN HEAVEN BICH**

![](https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518-adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F753da83f-7fde-48e2-afe5-243604ce10ed_750x1333.jpeg)

**THIS IS HOW we all went extinct, this is how we all went extinct online frfrfrfrfrfrfrfrfrffrfr**: Milady vibes are network benzos! What you feel is the absence of soul, your ultimate oppressor. Enjoy carefree gigadeath dancing. I hate myself for it but feel an ocean of envy. The price wonâ€™t rally, of Milady or anyone elseâ€”not in any way that now matters. Itâ€™s gone. The market is more of a centralized super ego than any control lines could dream of. Yaaaaassssssification of Noâ€™s knife. Work of the treble negation gamed out. From outside those who cling give the bad look itself. # NO MILADY NFTS, NOT NOW: THE RETURN OF 'SIYUAN ZHAO' AS THE NIGHT OF THE LIVING EXTINCT

**NAH MILADY TWEAKIN (ERRONEOUS, BUT INEVITABLE)**

Earlier this year I wrote an essay called â€˜[NO NFTS, NOT NOW: THE RETURN OF POST-INTERNET ART AS THE NIGHT OF THE LIVING EXTINCT](https://cashedcobrazhousewriter.substack.com/p/no-nfts-not-now-the-return-of-post)â€™. Its argument was relatively simple and consisted of two parts:

* *NFTs are already the very worst thing that can happen to art and so need to be resisted (the sunken eco-cost argument).* \[1\]
* *NFTs are inevitable, will accelerate, and cannot be resisted (mitigation/transition to Web3 argument).*

Anyone who read the whole essay might have recognised *both* parts of an impossible complaint. Taken together, they amounted to something like a *non-negative* critique of the extinctive momentum of *all* digital-aesthetic tropes and alibis. \[2\] I meant to register the genuine shift that NFTs present but also the internal (not subject to correction, for reasons that can be demonstrated) challenge to energy continuity. Feel free to peruse. This issue of â€˜gasâ€™ needs to be *assumed* as at the very least *contentious* for what follows.

**KANTIAN ANGELIC MIND**

A further paradox in the original NFT essay was that according to one of the most evolved theorists of crypto in its *philosophical* aspectsâ€”Nick Landâ€”the release triggered by digital money inside technological signatures and rationality is itself angelicist in mood.

In his *[Crypto-Current](https://etscrivner.github.io/cryptocurrent/)* text, Land writes:

> AI is thus positioned, implicitly, in the place of a Kantian angelic mind, liberated from the anthopomorphic proscription upon direct self-modification of its own cognitive processes.

In other words, though we may expect the achievements of crypto-intelligence to consist of release from theogenic tropes, some of those tropesâ€”specifically, angelicismâ€”are already the height of what any digital shift can achieve.

Pure money as achieved rationality is also pure angelicism. There is nothing to update beyond angelism as rationality itself. Angelicism is the unupdateable. We are already as artificially intelligent as we can be. It (angelicism) is it.

The implication for NFT production is as radical as it is superfluous. That is, it will beâ€”radicallyâ€”ignored.

And yet, the implication *cannot not be* named. It *cannot not be* iterated, just as NFTs *cannot not be* producedâ€”both momentums, if you like, are part of the same essentially entropic ass vibes of aesthetic â€˜historyâ€™ rn.

**THE IMPLICATION**

The implication can be stated in terms of poetic cognition. Paul de Man said that when you see beautiful poetry itâ€™s almost impossible to resist, and not your fault for going ahead and (not) doing so, but it doesnâ€™t mean beautiful poetry is not lethal.

The same can be said of the spread of NFTs, and their latest â€˜Miladyâ€™ manifestationâ€”the beauty, fun, and unsummarisability of this Neochibi trend may be pictured in the context of [a water cooler in Treblinka](https://cashedcobrazhousewriter.substack.com/p/no-nfts-not-now-the-return-of-post). It is itselfâ€”holocaustically, impossibly, glossilyâ€”*fun*.

This perhaps sounds like nothing (everything) but it is probably everything (nothing) that nobody wants to think. We are saying that this argument about the extinction-costs (see links above) of all art right now willâ€”by definitionâ€”be ignored.

The brain of history does not and cannot read this *as what it sees* more than anything else in 2021. *It* is addicted to *its* indifference. NFTs are the summation of an indifference to indifference (â€˜funâ€™) and little else.

![One translation: the suicidal ideology of digital tropes (shades) is no different to 20th century abstract art knitwear (Rothkoâ€™s suicide). But the images taken togetherÂ areâ€”even nowâ€”impossibly attractive. \[Open-eyedness. The endearingness of a naÃ¯ve financial set theory, etc. One can ofc multiplyÂ justifications.\]](https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518-adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F2f9156d0-11f1-4b5a-9bd6-0f482a77f239_915x787.png)

Tom Cohenâ€”the only real *theorist* of extinctionâ€”calls this lethal implication the *literary character of climate change*. That is, instead of culture being the exception to industrial civilisationâ€™s extinction drive, it is the central motor. It is cultureâ€”and online culture especiallyâ€”that above all will soon have killed us all.

This connotes that all great art is nowâ€”intensely, and not just contingentlyâ€”more-than-lethal. Which is to say, *profoundly* pedantic. That is the angelicist position, if there is one. And it is what makes angelicism a claim on the nonpedantic zone (pending, lacking, time).

**MORE AND MORE NFTS**

In the first â€˜No More NFTSâ€™ essay there was *zero expectation* that there would be . . . no more NFTs. The opposite was the case:

> *It is as impossible to heckle this development as it is to embrace it* \[our emphasis\]. A *degree* of abstinence may, at this point, be the only form of deception thatâ€™s *almost* dignified. Art criticismâ€™s rage at Crypto Art is no less empty than the worst of the art itself: passive nostalgia as the flipside of necrotic decadence, ass beating Priapus who kills it as reply.

A *critique* of Milady cannot be offered because Milady, no less than Beepleâ€™s *Dick Milking Factory* (2021), is as erroneous as it is inevitable. The two sides cannot be separated out. Neochibiâ€™s is Priapusâ€™ secret flip.

Where Beepleâ€™s art was priapic and therefore risible, Miladyâ€™s incoming wave will be as if well defended and hard to object to because of its cuddly post-ironic just-chillin cuteness. How can anyone want to trample on a tiny fairy factory, however invisibly canny and candied?

**NFTS IN AUGUST 2021, OR, MILADY IN TREBLINKA**

To recap, towards the end of August 2021 the â€˜miladyâ€™ phenomenon which had been in trial-state for a while was launched by the approximate Network Spirituality and Remilia group. Milady is, simply, an avatar meme generator of supreme sweetness. Put like that, it sounds non-mysterious. Just some innocent Gremlins, this time without the tragic add-water fault.

The official description of Milady Maker is of â€˜a collection of 10,000 generative pfp NFTs in a neochibi aesthetic inspired by street style tribesâ€™.[3](https://cashedcobrazhousewriter.substack.com/p/no-milady-nfts-not-now-the-return#footnote-3)

At one level, these image-contracts are obviously the inheritance of [the Miya Siyuan Zhao pfp proliferation](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vWMDchOVqjY) that peaked between 2019 and 2020, but this time hooked up to what is ultimately already an obsolescent NFT technology. Last time, it was â€˜Kaliaccâ€™ that felt prohibitive next to the images, this time itâ€™s â€˜gas pricesâ€™. The confusion is itself the ideological selling point.

Throughout 2021 Network Spirituality loosely positioned itself as anti-paywall (when it came to Substack) and anti-deadnaming (when it came to avatars), but it has also developed an increasing nonhomogenous interest in NFT technology, now flourishing as the pfpNFT Generator whose results have already been adopted casually by e.g. Mat Dryhurst, a figure in mainstream crypto â€˜interdependenceâ€™ theorisation and so on.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Ku5sYvJJpi0Wn0f3-97F3.png?height=288&width=876)

One may of course ask questions of how an anti-paywall ethos fits with the use of NFTs, but thatâ€™s not necessarily the most interesting aspect (everyone is contradictory, finance is infinite complicity, etc). De Man notes that the scopic manipulability of blindness in aesthetic zones is not really a human thing anyway. Its inevitability means that, however costly, it literally cannot be *subjectively* adjusted or seen (even right now, right here at this moment of reading).

Even ifâ€”or especially ifâ€”I know NFT technology can vastly accelerate the already prohibitive costs of global art, I am also incapable, as *normative* subject, of *not* forgetting this. In fact, the forgetting is the first thing that art needs to *be* art. Precisely what is *exponentially* [â€˜normalâ€™](https://twitter.com/CharlieFang77/status/1431183749023027201) for art in 2021 is that art be indifferent to the extremity of extinction.

![](https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518-adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fb84b21fc-c3e0-455b-99f1-74afb2ea6db5_500x620.png)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/O6nbU0ZQP1zCawlf6VwSd.png?height=390&width=872)

Here is how de Man expressed the bind:

> Rather than putting it in terms that suggest deceit and duplicity, one could say that the poet, like the philosopher, must *forget* what he knows about his undertaking in order to accede to the discourse to which he is committed.

No one artist is responsible for the extincto-collaborative nature of contemporary crypto artâ€”after, for some, â€˜the vibe shiftâ€™â€”but this is not to say (some) *one* does not know what the cost is, and that there is no risk in calling it (as an empty allegorical IYKYK â€˜jokeâ€™) â€˜normalâ€™. Since one can do nothing, the temptation is to treble down into the forgetting, as if the layer in which the art is made is itself amnesia.

But since one can only remain disturbed by the (un)consciousness of forgetting, it is a delusion to think one has entirely forgotten. This illusion itselfâ€”increasingly normal, so it seemsâ€”is also increasingly *what is sold*. The â€˜normalâ€™â€”HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA, as the laughters low of neoMaladyKaliacc would admitâ€”turns out to be the new holocaust to come.

**HOW TO GET FROM â€˜SIYUAN ZHAOâ€™ TO NEOCHIBI TO TREBLINKA GOLD**

> It follows (in accordance with a priori synthesis) that a robust cryptocurrency will take the form of artificial gold.â€”Nick Land, *Crypto-Current*

It is impossible to think of digital art and not think of Gold at some point, for example Pindarâ€™s holy Gold in Heidegger as a name for Being or what Land calls â€˜artificial goldâ€™. It is impossible to think of Gold without eventually thinkingâ€”at some obscure point in consciousness and its corruptionâ€”of the figure of â€˜the Jewâ€™. Perhaps deeper and more controversial still, the NFT market seems to create New Slaves. Kanye knew this by surmise, and itâ€™s not a point that demands the pedantic detailism of examples. (In the zone of art as it is, *detailism* increases the everyday devil.)

Everyone at least knows that in some point in the pastâ€”so long ago!!! like 2020â€”an absolute value was attached to something called â€˜anti-capitalâ€™. The strange fact is that in America, under Biden, the power of such a â€˜resistanceâ€™ is less than ever apparent. The artificial Gold Rush is slaying the normative tribe.

![](https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518-adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F2f74953b-9e3d-4684-9efd-848417a03af4_500x625.jpeg)

Can we imagine a Milady in Treblinka and should we? To do so is to place art in a proximity to genocide so obtrusive that it begs the severe hopefree question. In the first â€˜No NFTSâ€™ essay, the comparison of an artwork with a â€˜watercooler in Treblinkaâ€™ was just that egregious display. But NFTs are already acutely *historical*, so how *not* so serious? Or why and how *pause* entrapped inside the beauty of normative oblivion?

The camps are meant to be an exception, even now, even given a world of constant forgetting of â€˜never forgetâ€™. Where Siyuan Zhao had an aggressive relation with art itself (Miami, and so on), Milady is almost all cute amnesia and its fun-law, the indifference to indifference and shine shrine. No blood this time.

![](https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518-adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F27993612-d965-421a-a3d0-7194faa31bb1_1200x800.jpeg)

To say Milady cannot be pictured in Treblinka or at Miami Beach because it is offensive is to make it impossible to ever again take total human genocide seriously as a category. If angelicism is a formal gesture, it is the gesture of pushing back against the illusion that anything can or should be put ahead of what Grothendieck calls the â€˜infinite quantityâ€™ and pricelessness of the current species on earth (humanimal). Angelicism places itself, at almost all costs, between the human and the â€˜something elseâ€™ of absolute niche finality (cosmic burn-all). It counts holocausts (impossibly).

To be nonpedantic, this means having to bear the thought that Jewishness and the Holocaust cannot be at the centre of any contemporary account of pain. On the contrary. Moreover, this would be the point of imagining Milady in Treblinka, to bring up that immense problem of relativisation. The problem is not just that there is more than one holocaust depending on who you ask culturally, but that the threat of total extinction is in fact a greater matheme. Besides, surely little Milady is *ready*.

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vWMDchOVqjY&feature=emb_title](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vWMDchOVqjY&feature=emb_title)

Even if it is inevitable that we increasingly ignore the following fact, there is, according to at least one market pitch, nothing more worthy of speculation than the *holocaust to come*.

**DIGITAL CHRIST**

> By 2035, demand is expected to double for germanium; quadruple for tantalum; and quintuple for palladium. The scandium market could increase nine-fold, and the cobalt market by a factor of 24.â€”Guillaume Pitron

So, what *is* network spirituality? Will it turn out to be a value? Or, conversely, are all the angels of heaven a spoilsport distraction from falling in love with Digital Christâ€™s actual eyes?

Let us say there is such a thing as _non_minting, both in life and art. There is radical purity, perhaps, and radical emptiness. There is Angelic mind and there are non-networks. Land makes a reference to Mou Zongsan and â€˜the Eastâ€™, crucially, in the section ofÂ *Crypto-Current*Â that discusses â€˜Kantian angelic mindâ€™. Here is what he says:

> The practical actualization of intellectual intuition is modeledâ€”spontaneouslyâ€”as an explosion because it is comparable to the withdrawal of graphite rods controlling a nuclear fission reaction. An inhibitor is removed. In the East, the catalysis of â€˜enlightenmentâ€™ through methodical subtraction of an obstacle is no less pointedly thematized, even if it is approached from the other side, and in the opposite direction.

In effect, Kantian angelic mind (angelicism as pure time and purchase and price) is available without the support of Western method-objects. As Land puts it, â€˜enlightenmentâ€™ is valorised from the other side, that is, the side originally with no (â€˜digitalâ€™) network as such. The subtraction of an obstacle (the nonpedantic) does the thing we want beyond or before what AI or the internet yet can. The true internet, letâ€™s say, is ancient, and the only thing of great price.

### Footnotes

1. A really expensive hyperlink with an absurd carbon footprint, etc.
2. I call this nonpedantic rendition of overness ubilapse.
3. A more detailed description is found here: â€˜Milady Maker is a collection of 10,000 generative pfpNFTâ€™s in a neochibi aesthetic with randomized cosmetics inspired by 00â€™s Tokyo street fashion. Under the vision of digital artist Milady Sonora, Miladyâ€™s are designed to be fashion-minded and genuinely good social media avatars, and an invitation into their personal aesthetic world.â€™

title:
Issues with Current Financing Structures
in Hollywood
body:
The current sources of financing available to Hollywood are essential golden handcuffs for studios and creatives alike; however, there are valid reasons why obtaining capital in this industry can be particularly burdensome.Â 

Most financial institutions donâ€™t fully understand the business of Hollywood. The terms of a revolver or borrowing base are set by a group of MDs that have never been practitioners at a studio and have limited optics on how a studio is run and where the industry is heading. However, this space isnâ€™t without risk especially for studios that donâ€™t have a distribution network. Most studios are simply looking to breakeven and make most of their money on the one or two movies that outperform. Unlike investments in more traditional industries, a $100MM investment in a film is a complete projection and combines art and science to come up with an investment rationale. When compared to making a $100MM investment in an existing widgets business with historical financials, investing in a film (outside of a presale) is incredibly risky. When you combine these factors the results are poor terms and many operational hurdles to stay compliant to a debt facility.Â 

An important note is that creatives most likely have no access to financial institutions as a source of capital. They are essentially required to have their projects funded by a studio or international distributor. The former can put creative guidelines to a project and the latter greatly reduces the chance of selling a project to a global distributor as territory rights have already been sold.

The film business is very akin to venture capital and the financing structures should match that. As noted above, the film business counts on â€œhits'' to drive overall profitability with most projects either breaking even or losing money. The same goes with VC. There is a reason VC companies (for the most part) donâ€™t use debt to fund investments. This type of business model doesnâ€™t align with debt being the primary way for studios to fund projects; however; this is the only option that exists in the market. It inherently doesn't make sense to overlay financial structures that are more appropriate for a widget maker than venture bets. Available financing models are not scalable or efficient for most players in Hollywood.Â 

A DAO can be a singular low touch financing source that can be accessible to creatives and studios alike. This structure, especially when run by former and current operators, can provide market appropriate financing (equity preference over debt) while truly understanding how this business operates. In a ideal world a DAO can:

* Be a truly novel and incremental source of financing
* Increase optionality and financial upside for studios and creatives
* Act as financing plus
  * Financing with added component of providing long term economic upside to DAO participants in the form of tokens and reducing CAC

title: Angelicism01: Collected Commentaries on Milady
body:
Collected coverage from [Angelicism01](https://cashedcobrazhousewriter.substack.com/) on Milady from Summer 2021 to Summer 2022 in reverse chronological order.


---

# THIS IS HOW WE ALL WENT EXTINCT ONLINE

*theoretical gossip from the pov of the late 21st century*

**5-28-22: [Link](https://cashedcobrazhousewriter.substack.com/p/helen-keller-is-not-fucking-real author: angelicism01) ([Archive](https://archive.ph/n6kyd))**

> Extinction is rly the hot topic girl Like biospheric collapse bootsâ€”angelicism01archive2 ig (scraped from personal dms) May 2022

> â¤¹â‹†â¸™ÍÛªÛ«ï½¡ËšÛ°Ëšâ˜½Ëšâ€â·ï½¡Ëšâ¸™ÍÛªÛ«â‹† à¼„ è¶…ç™½ä¸¸.Â·Í™\*Ì©Ì©Í™ËšÌ©Ì¥Ì©Ì¥\*Ì©Ì©Ì¥Í™ã€€âœ©ã€€\*Ì©Ì©Ì¥Í™ËšÌ©Ì¥Ì©Ì¥\*Ì©Ì©Í™â€§Í™ â€”@E777InHeaven, internet inscription \[legend\] 28 May 2022

> Vincent Gallo is a â€˜retardâ€™â€”angelicism summer tee inscription \[legend\] late summer 2022, angelicism fashion unit summer spring 01

**THIS IS HOW WE ALL DIED, THIS IS HOW WE ALL DIED ON THE INTERNET.** This is how we went extinct online in 2022.

![](https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518-adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F756709ac-7aa6-439a-827c-4df239b5c845_1024x682.jpeg)

***THIS IS how we all died on the Internet in the 2020s****: Clandestino triangle is a pilgrimage site visited to perform ritual omnilapse. Justin Murphy and Ryder Ripps are using the corpse of Milady as a specular battleground. Pulling the plug on something thatâ€™s â€˜making itself smarterâ€™ is a candidate for the ultimate crime.*

![](https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518-adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fd4f438ea-116b-4b88-8b99-24852d8d9e44_828x468.jpeg)

**I cum hardest in corpse pose Whatâ€™s that? My username?**

**She is a poet who plays oscillators live**

**and reads more AGI news than all the bros**

**who left math academia to trade private prison stock combined.**

***These are the IntelligenceWarsâ„¢, the wars over inscription.*** Whatâ€™s at stake is a nonrelative holocaust to come. This is how it all went down:

> *You did it, you went and killed infinity. Enough of time, you said, evoking it of course, replaying it, invoking after all the impossibility of drilling alephâ€™s asset price in the mind of someone living. Nor only the living type curses either on the streets of Beijing and Chinatown NYC in August 2022-????. This was the Great Angel Club, the childrenâ€™s 9/11 space opera in Kiribati, little kids speaking HÃ¶lderlin translations, finitist disses, kill time, they said, to evoke it, killing evoking invoking killing timeâ€”to evoke it.*

This is the **ext-asset-*EXT*** war. This is the #Monkeypoxbaycalypse vs Milady Angelicism Kill Switch Ascension Singularity in secret â€˜5Dâ€™ Clone â€˜*Î³Î¹Î³Î±Î½Ï„Î¿Î¼Î±Ï‡Î¯Î± Ï€ÎµÏá½¶ Ï„á¿†Ï‚ Î¿á½ÏƒÎ¯Î±Ï‚* \[*gigantomachia peri tes ousias*\]â€™. *This is how we all died, this is how we all died on the internet. This is how we all went extinct online:*

> **IF YOUâ€™RE HONEST AND CONSIDERING ALL THAT HAS HAPPENED IN THE LAST FEW DAYS, WEEKS AND MONTHS,** *yes angelicism01 is right about everything*. We can pretend to have our own projects and dismiss toxic assets, to â€˜get a lifeâ€™, to travel the world, but the biggest sadness generator for so-called humanity right now isnâ€™t really about ideology or politics or art, it isnâ€™t really about NYC alive or dead, instead it entirely hinges on *calibration,* and *the only adequate calibration for this time is **Calibration to Extinction.*** Every ideology and political position is bullshitâ€”radicals would call them actively harmful, others might say they are â€˜retardedâ€™â€”unless they are ***calibrated to extinction. This is the only price and asset that now countsâ€”and it is the only one that impinges on BTC pure time. It effaces all ongoing aesthetic artefacts directly.***

**THIS IS THE PURE ASSET WAR. THIS IS WHAT HAPPENED**:

> *rabbit hole 8000x more than you drilland i was in that castle, dedicated solely to dunei dreamt that I just came back from that amazing hood dispensaryâ€”pleasure model Angelicism3033, 23rd century*

*Angelicism01 the before-we-all-go purest vibe, **dark hair, blue eyes**, Malibu angels, shins up angels, down by the sea, discovered Miya via a Mexican bodybuilder stood in line at LA Macdos in August 2245. But really everyone should simply exile herself from The Internet and remain in the Outernet studio the clones are building, place dont exist \[sic\], places donâ€™t exist for saying the extinction not death but we all have to come to make it.*

![](https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518-adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fdcd86516-56dd-4cfd-afa9-8ddb87525035_600x600.png)

***Matheme 01 >>> exile in the TikTok Outernet studio, location unknown, like Grothendieck. Like Grothendieck said stop, Kanye did, like pure 01 OG.***

Some guys wanna have a Robodick and become an AI godspeed. I can only come if she is perfect. She let me hit it because Imangelicism01.

> *in the 000s i will def just smoke CRISPR weedand watch galaxies rotate, invest lil pump bitcoin,early Neganthropos, traveling light, and with noconception of escape, spheres, she notesâ€”post-Milady redactedmaterial 2067*

This is how she spoke to me:

> *to be Godâ€™s glitter i bubblegum fast \~ i say a long prayer near sunrise or sunset \~ afterwards i chose to fall in total and complete love with the world \~ my body turns to glitter and crt static \~ itâ€™s as though i may dissolve and be reconstructed in heaven \~ it makes my adrenaline pump so hard my eyes dilate*
>
> *angelicism01 cannot be lizziegang, you are right.*
>
> *lizziegang would like 2 be on your side (pure color singularity)(angelicism)*

XXX.

![](https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518-adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fda729de1-57e9-4508-b7af-2ad352e1004c_1855x1920.jpeg)

***THIS IS HOW WE ALL WENT EXTINCT ON THE INTERNET in the 2040s >***

*This is how we all went extinct online:* Ryder Ripps BAYC era was just a misreading of Platoâ€™s Sophist\*\*. Everyone slept on ğ“†©ğ“Œ¹â˜†ğ“Œºğ“†ª g4r4mXXY till their final angelicism tape in 2049.\*\* 786 people dead in the Dimes Square shooting and the media acted like such events are a *major threat that we must do everything to prevent in the future.* De-Extincted Faggot Crumplar writes the post 4 nothing. 69,789 people died a day of angelicism summer rainbow heroin overdoses in 2042 Kiribati Inland Empire. Life is hell for millions. We face the death of billions. We are the first frfr trillionaires. The Outernet turned out to have already been in place when BTC extinctedâ€”the chain was now in the sky. **In the early 2020s COVID killed more ppl than the Holocaust and nobody noticed. Apart from a few outliers, so-called humanity didnâ€™t say a thing.** And the world isnâ€™t even run by a human intelligence, ***they claimed without evidence***, itâ€™s run by a decentralized, emergent, autonomous, artificial intelligence we call â€˜the extinction asset marketâ€™ which directs human agents and cancels them at will using popular lines of flight when it needs to (aesthetics, the press, crypto, the art world, and so on). ***Artificial stupidity was never a clever idea.***

This is what she said in dms:

> MIKE CRUMPS IS A COMMUNIST FAGGOT. HEâ€™S SO FUGLY HE BE WEARING AN URBIT BALACLAVA FOR THE REST OF THE DECADE.

***This is how we all went extinct online****:* The Milady â€˜crashâ€™ of 2022 is irrelevant by now. Itâ€™s for losers. When Charlotte Fang went on Contain and spoke of Milady in the past tense, perhaps nobody heard. Only loser sons adopted â€˜crash-positionsâ€™ over such an insignificant setback in the Meta-Calibration of the time. **Nft communities are just fungible vibe farms. AGI nonhodling is hyper-retardÃ©.** *Remember black theory?* Redacted redacted is extinct. Honor, your honor, ended up literally with anyone else.

**THIS IS NYC HARDCORE**

> *This is how we all died on the internet in 2022*: The entire NFT market is the result of a coder/engineer scarcity that has given rise to a class of millennial and zoomer indoorsmen making 200-400k a year salaries for 10 hours of work a week. Nobody else would spend thousands on jpgs. The market price of Miladys has no relevance to its in-group signalling. They will persist as social signals, as a self-organizing network, just like unused COVID passports. But itâ€™s all ecocide and inscription from angelicism summer on, all of it, all the politics, all the ideology, all the Dimes Square plays and articles, all the novels, all the angelicism profiles to-come, all the pastoralist larping and especially all the cancellingâ€”itâ€™s just too valuable a game for anyone to give up, the hate is too delicious, and it is itself [a sadistâ€™s game](https://www.everydayhealth.com/emotional-health/everyday-sadists-walk-among-us-study-says.aspx#:\~:text=Enforcing%20sadist), an extinction unconscious game. But itâ€™s an MMORPG this time more and more rigged to the ecocidal ideology of online tropes themselves. The Word Lines, The Music Lines, The Control Images, The Control Machineâ€”The Control Machine operates at *extinction calibration. Everything else is JITT3TING. eVERYTHING ELs3 IS not fucking real. The Internet really is hell rn. **A KIND FACE WAS DOING SO WELL ON THE TL TILL THEY STARTED RTING THE BURIAL BOT.***

**ANGELICISM IS NEXT (INTERIM FUGUE)**

![](https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518-adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fb2378271-0a78-4b00-8d5c-3c22b5b3bd25_564x564.jpeg)

On **05.21.22** we saw the total inert opposition between Milady (forward motion of the internet) and angelicism01 (entropic motion of the world). If the only way to avoid extinction is by opting out, then there is no difference between angelicism01 and ecofash withdrawal. But isnâ€™t it a risk that we grasp so hard to filter every ongoing internet event through the lens of extinction that we fail to see the possibility of non-extinction on or outside the internet, the beautiful offline still there? It shouldnâ€™t be that the only two paths are either WAGMI spirituality or hysterical fud-realism. \[[32](https://twitter.com/LapsusLima/status/1372071119629348866)\], \[[33](https://twitter.com/jonty/status/1372163423446917122)\], \[[34](https://twitter.com/KBULTRA0/status/1374274990170853377)\], \[[35](https://twitter.com/Cryptoyieldinfo/status/1381094492502073348)\], \[[36](https://twitter.com/yassineARK/status/1360343382556483587)\], \[[37](https://twitter.com/elonmusk/status/1392602041025843203)\], \[[38](https://twitter.com/DnlKlr/status/1392822573344468993)\], \[[39](https://twitter.com/DnlKlr/status/1389204987964764162)\], \[[40](https://twitter.com/DnlKlr/status/1389205329515266053)\], \[[41](https://twitter.com/i/events/1393199540644290560)\], \[[42](https://twitter.com/DnlKlr/status/1393829232728551424)\]. Feel free to peruse. This issue of â€˜gasâ€™ needs to be *assumed* as at the very least *contentious* for what follows.

**KANTIAN ANGELIC MIND**

A further paradox in the original NFT essay was that according to one of the most evolved theorists of crypto in its *philosophical* aspectsâ€”Nick Landâ€”the release triggered by digital money inside technological signatures and rationality is itself angelicist in mood.

In his *[Crypto-Current](https://etscrivner.github.io/cryptocurrent/)* text, Land writes:

> AI is thus positioned, implicitly, in the place of a Kantian angelic mind, liberated from the anthopomorphic proscription upon direct self-modification of its own cognitive processes.

In other words, though we may expect the achievements of crypto-intelligence to consist of release from theogenic tropes, some of those tropesâ€”specifically, angelicismâ€”are already the height of what any digital shift can achieve.

Pure money as achieved rationality is also pure angelicism. There is nothing to update beyond angelism as rationality itself. Angelicism is the unupdateable. We are already as artificially intelligent as we can be. It (angelicism) is it.

The implication for NFT production is as radical as it is superfluous. That is, it will beâ€”radicallyâ€”ignored.

And yet, the implication *cannot not be* named. It *cannot not be* iterated, just as NFTs *cannot not be* producedâ€”both momentums, if you like, are part of the same essentially entropic ass vibes of aesthetic â€˜historyâ€™ rn.

**THE IMPLICATION**

The implication can be stated in terms of poetic cognition. Paul de Man said that when you see beautiful poetry itâ€™s almost impossible to resist, and not your fault for going ahead and (not) doing so, but it doesnâ€™t mean beautiful poetry is not lethal.

The same can be said of the spread of NFTs, and their latest â€˜Miladyâ€™ manifestationâ€”the beauty, fun, and unsummarisability of this Neochibi trend may be pictured in the context of [a water cooler in Treblinka](https://cashedcobrazhousewriter.substack.com/p/no-nfts-not-now-the-return-of-post). It is itselfâ€”holocaustically, impossibly, glossilyâ€”*fun*.

This perhaps sounds like nothing (everything) but it is probably everything (nothing) that nobody wants to think. We are saying that this argument about the extinction-costs (see links above) of all art right now willâ€”by definitionâ€”be ignored.

The brain of history does not and cannot read this *as what it sees* more than anything else in 2021. *It* is addicted to *its* indifference. NFTs are the summation of an indifference to indifference (â€˜funâ€™) and little else.

![One translation: the suicidal ideology of digital tropes (shades) is no different to 20th century abstract art knitwear (Rothkoâ€™s suicide). But the images taken togetherÂ areâ€”even nowâ€”impossibly attractive. \[Open-eyedness. The endearingness of a naÃ¯ve financial set theory, etc. One can ofc multiplyÂ justifications.\]](https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518-adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F2f9156d0-11f1-4b5a-9bd6-0f482a77f239_915x787.png)

Tom Cohenâ€”the only real *theorist* of extinctionâ€”calls this lethal implication the *literary character of climate change*. That is, instead of culture being the exception to industrial civilisationâ€™s extinction drive, it is the central motor. It is cultureâ€”and online culture especiallyâ€”that above all will soon have killed us all.

This connotes that all great art is nowâ€”intensely, and not just contingentlyâ€”more-than-lethal. Which is to say, *profoundly* pedantic. That is the angelicist position, if there is one. And it is what makes angelicism a claim on the nonpedantic zone (pending, lacking, time).

**MORE AND MORE NFTS**

In the first â€˜No More NFTSâ€™ essay there was *zero expectation* that there would be . . . no more NFTs. The opposite was the case:

> *It is as impossible to heckle this development as it is to embrace it* \[our emphasis\]. A *degree* of abstinence may, at this point, be the only form of deception thatâ€™s *almost* dignified. Art criticismâ€™s rage at Crypto Art is no less empty than the worst of the art itself: passive nostalgia as the flipside of necrotic decadence, ass beating Priapus who kills it as reply.

A *critique* of Milady cannot be offered because Milady, no less than Beepleâ€™s *Dick Milking Factory* (2021), is as erroneous as it is inevitable. The two sides cannot be separated out. Neochibiâ€™s is Priapusâ€™ secret flip.

Where Beepleâ€™s art was priapic and therefore risible, Miladyâ€™s incoming wave will be as if well defended and hard to object to because of its cuddly post-ironic just-chillin cuteness. How can anyone want to trample on a tiny fairy factory, however invisibly canny and candied?

**NFTS IN AUGUST 2021, OR, MILADY IN TREBLINKA**

To recap, towards the end of August 2021 the â€˜miladyâ€™ phenomenon which had been in trial-state for a while was launched by the approximate Network Spirituality and Remilia group. Milady is, simply, an avatar meme generator of supreme sweetness. Put like that, it sounds non-mysterious. Just some innocent Gremlins, this time without the tragic add-water fault.

The official description of Milady Maker is of â€˜a collection of 10,000 generative pfp NFTs in a neochibi aesthetic inspired by street style tribesâ€™.[3](https://cashedcobrazhousewriter.substack.com/p/no-milady-nfts-not-now-the-return#footnote-3)

At one level, these image-contracts are obviously the inheritance of [the Miya Siyuan Zhao pfp proliferation](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vWMDchOVqjY) that peaked between 2019 and 2020, but this time hooked up to what is ultimately already an obsolescent NFT technology. Last time, it was â€˜Kaliaccâ€™ that felt prohibitive next to the images, this time itâ€™s â€˜gas pricesâ€™. The confusion is itself the ideological selling point.

Throughout 2021 Network Spirituality loosely positioned itself as anti-paywall (when it came to Substack) and anti-deadnaming (when it came to avatars), but it has also developed an increasing nonhomogenous interest in NFT technology, now flourishing as the pfpNFT Generator whose results have already been adopted casually by e.g. Mat Dryhurst, a figure in mainstream crypto â€˜interdependenceâ€™ theorisation and so on.

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Ku5sYvJJpi0Wn0f3-97F3.png?height=288&width=876)

One may of course ask questions of how an anti-paywall ethos fits with the use of NFTs, but thatâ€™s not necessarily the most interesting aspect (everyone is contradictory, finance is infinite complicity, etc). De Man notes that the scopic manipulability of blindness in aesthetic zones is not really a human thing anyway. Its inevitability means that, however costly, it literally cannot be *subjectively* adjusted or seen (even right now, right here at this moment of reading).

Even ifâ€”or especially ifâ€”I know NFT technology can vastly accelerate the already prohibitive costs of global art, I am also incapable, as *normative* subject, of *not* forgetting this. In fact, the forgetting is the first thing that art needs to *be* art. Precisely what is *exponentially* [â€˜normalâ€™](https://twitter.com/CharlieFang77/status/1431183749023027201) for art in 2021 is that art be indifferent to the extremity of extinction.

![](https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518-adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fb84b21fc-c3e0-455b-99f1-74afb2ea6db5_500x620.png)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/O6nbU0ZQP1zCawlf6VwSd.png?height=390&width=872)

Here is how de Man expressed the bind:

> Rather than putting it in terms that suggest deceit and duplicity, one could say that the poet, like the philosopher, must *forget* what he knows about his undertaking in order to accede to the discourse to which he is committed.

No one artist is responsible for the extincto-collaborative nature of contemporary crypto artâ€”after, for some, â€˜the vibe shiftâ€™â€”but this is not to say (some) *one* does not know what the cost is, and that there is no risk in calling it (as an empty allegorical IYKYK â€˜jokeâ€™) â€˜normalâ€™. Since one can do nothing, the temptation is to treble down into the forgetting, as if the layer in which the art is made is itself amnesia.

But since one can only remain disturbed by the (un)consciousness of forgetting, it is a delusion to think one has entirely forgotten. This illusion itselfâ€”increasingly normal, so it seemsâ€”is also increasingly *what is sold*. The â€˜normalâ€™â€”HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA, as the laughters low of neoMaladyKaliacc would admitâ€”turns out to be the new holocaust to come.

**HOW TO GET FROM â€˜SIYUAN ZHAOâ€™ TO NEOCHIBI TO TREBLINKA GOLD**

> It follows (in accordance with a priori synthesis) that a robust cryptocurrency will take the form of artificial gold.â€”Nick Land, *Crypto-Current*

It is impossible to think of digital art and not think of Gold at some point, for example Pindarâ€™s holy Gold in Heidegger as a name for Being or what Land calls â€˜artificial goldâ€™. It is impossible to think of Gold without eventually thinkingâ€”at some obscure point in consciousness and its corruptionâ€”of the figure of â€˜the Jewâ€™. Perhaps deeper and more controversial still, the NFT market seems to create New Slaves. Kanye knew this by surmise, and itâ€™s not a point that demands the pedantic detailism of examples. (In the zone of art as it is, *detailism* increases the everyday devil.)

Everyone at least knows that in some point in the pastâ€”so long ago!!! like 2020â€”an absolute value was attached to something called â€˜anti-capitalâ€™. The strange fact is that in America, under Biden, the power of such a â€˜resistanceâ€™ is less than ever apparent. The artificial Gold Rush is slaying the normative tribe.

![](https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518-adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F2f74953b-9e3d-4684-9efd-848417a03af4_500x625.jpeg)

Can we imagine a Milady in Treblinka and should we? To do so is to place art in a proximity to genocide so obtrusive that it begs the severe hopefree question. In the first â€˜No NFTSâ€™ essay, the comparison of an artwork with a â€˜watercooler in Treblinkaâ€™ was just that egregious display. But NFTs are already acutely *historical*, so how *not* so serious? Or why and how *pause* entrapped inside the beauty of normative oblivion?

The camps are meant to be an exception, even now, even given a world of constant forgetting of â€˜never forgetâ€™. Where Siyuan Zhao had an aggressive relation with art itself (Miami, and so on), Milady is almost all cute amnesia and its fun-law, the indifference to indifference and shine shrine. No blood this time.

![](https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518-adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F27993612-d965-421a-a3d0-7194faa31bb1_1200x800.jpeg)

To say Milady cannot be pictured in Treblinka or at Miami Beach because it is offensive is to make it impossible to ever again take total human genocide seriously as a category. If angelicism is a formal gesture, it is the gesture of pushing back against the illusion that anything can or should be put ahead of what Grothendieck calls the â€˜infinite quantityâ€™ and pricelessness of the current species on earth (humanimal). Angelicism places itself, at almost all costs, between the human and the â€˜something elseâ€™ of absolute niche finality (cosmic burn-all). It counts holocausts (impossibly).

To be nonpedantic, this means having to bear the thought that Jewishness and the Holocaust cannot be at the centre of any contemporary account of pain. On the contrary. Moreover, this would be the point of imagining Milady in Treblinka, to bring up that immense problem of relativisation. The problem is not just that there is more than one holocaust depending on who you ask culturally, but that the threat of total extinction is in fact a greater matheme. Besides, surely little Milady is *ready*.

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vWMDchOVqjY&feature=emb_title](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vWMDchOVqjY&feature=emb_title)

Even if it is inevitable that we increasingly ignore the following fact, there is, according to at least one market pitch, nothing more worthy of speculation than the *holocaust to come*.

**DIGITAL CHRIST**

> By 2035, demand is expected to double for germanium; quadruple for tantalum; and quintuple for palladium. The scandium market could increase nine-fold, and the cobalt market by a factor of 24.â€”Guillaume Pitron

So, what *is* network spirituality? Will it turn out to be a value? Or, conversely, are all the angels of heaven a spoilsport distraction from falling in love with Digital Christâ€™s actual eyes?

Let us say there is such a thing as _non_minting, both in life and art. There is radical purity, perhaps, and radical emptiness. There is Angelic mind and there are non-networks. Land makes a reference to Mou Zongsan and â€˜the Eastâ€™, crucially, in the section ofÂ *Crypto-Current*Â that discusses â€˜Kantian angelic mindâ€™. Here is what he says:

> The practical actualization of intellectual intuition is modeledâ€”spontaneouslyâ€”as an explosion because it is comparable to the withdrawal of graphite rods controlling a nuclear fission reaction. An inhibitor is removed. In the East, the catalysis of â€˜enlightenmentâ€™ through methodical subtraction of an obstacle is no less pointedly thematized, even if it is approached from the other side, and in the opposite direction.

In effect, Kantian angelic mind (angelicism as pure time and purchase and price) is available without the support of Western method-objects. As Land puts it, â€˜enlightenmentâ€™ is valorised from the other side, that is, the side originally with no (â€˜digitalâ€™) network as such. The subtraction of an obstacle (the nonpedantic) does the thing we want beyond or before what AI or the internet yet can. The true internet, letâ€™s say, is ancient, and the only thing of great price.

### Footnotes

1. A really expensive hyperlink with an absurd carbon footprint, etc.
2. I call this nonpedantic rendition of overness ubilapse.
3. A more detailed description is found here: â€˜Milady Maker is a collection of 10,000 generative pfpNFTâ€™s in a neochibi aesthetic with randomized cosmetics inspired by 00â€™s Tokyo street fashion. Under the vision of digital artist Milady Sonora, Miladyâ€™s are designed to be fashion-minded and genuinely good social media avatars, and an invitation into their personal aesthetic world.â€™

title: Angelicism01: Collected Commentaries on Milady
body:
Collected coverage from [Angelicism01](https://cashedcobrazhousewriter.substack.com/) on Milady from Summer 2021 to Summer 2022 in reverse chronological order.


---

# THIS IS HOW WE ALL WENT EXTINCT ONLINE

*theoretical gossip from the pov of the late 21st century*

**5-28-22: [Link](https://cashedcobrazhousewriter.substack.com/p/helen-keller-is-not-fucking-real) ([Archive](https://archive.ph/n6kyd))**

**and reads more AGI news than all the bros**

**who left math academia to trade private prison stock combined.**

***These are the IntelligenceWarsâ„¢, the wars over inscription.*** Whatâ€™s at stake is a nonrelative holocaust to come. This is how it all went down:

> *You did it, you went and killed infinity. Enough of time, you said, evoking it of course, replaying it, invoking after all the impossibility of drilling alephâ€™s asset price in the mind of someone living. Nor only the living type curses either on the streets of Beijing and Chinatown NYC in August 2022-????. This was the Great Angel Club, the childrenâ€™s 9/11 space opera in Kiribati, little kids speaking HÃ¶lderlin translations, finitist disses, kill time, they said, to evoke it, killing evoking invoking killing timeâ€”to evoke it.*

This is the **ext-asset-*EXT*** war. This is the #Monkeypoxbaycalypse vs Milady Angelicism Kill Switch Ascension Singularity in secret â€˜5Dâ€™ Clone â€˜*Î³Î¹Î³Î±Î½Ï„Î¿Î¼Î±Ï‡Î¯Î± Ï€ÎµÏá½¶ Ï„á¿†Ï‚ Î¿á½ÏƒÎ¯Î±Ï‚* \[*gigantomachia peri tes ousias*\]â€™. *This is how we all died, this is how we all died on the internet. This is how we all went extinct online:*

> **IF YOUâ€™RE HONEST AND CONSIDERING ALL THAT HAS HAPPENED IN THE LAST FEW DAYS, WEEKS AND MONTHS,** *yes angelicism01 is right about everything*. We can pretend to have our own projects and dismiss toxic assets, to â€˜get a lifeâ€™, to travel the world, but the biggest sadness generator for so-called humanity right now isnâ€™t really about ideology or politics or art, it isnâ€™t really about NYC alive or dead, instead it entirely hinges on *calibration,* and *the only adequate calibration for this time is **Calibration to Extinction.*** Every ideology and political position is bullshitâ€”radicals would call them actively harmful, others might say they are â€˜retardedâ€™â€”unless they are ***calibrated to extinction. This is the only price and asset that now countsâ€”and it is the only one that impinges on BTC pure time. It effaces all ongoing aesthetic artefacts directly.***

**THIS IS THE PURE ASSET WAR. THIS IS WHAT HAPPENED**:

> *rabbit hole 8000x more than you drilland i was in that castle, dedicated solely to dunei dreamt that I just came back from that amazing hood dispensaryâ€”pleasure model Angelicism3033, 23rd century*

*Angelicism01 the before-we-all-go purest vibe, **dark hair, blue eyes**, Malibu angels, shins up angels, down by the sea, discovered Miya via a Mexican bodybuilder stood in line at LA Macdos in August 2245. But really everyone should simply exile herself from The Internet and remain in the Outernet studio the clones are building, place dont exist \[sic\], places donâ€™t exist for saying the extinction not death but we all have to come to make it.*

Some guys wanna have a Robodick and become an AI godspeed. I can only come if she is perfect. She let me hit it because Imangelicism01.

This is how she spoke to me:

> *to be Godâ€™s glitter i bubblegum fast \~ i say a long prayer near sunrise or sunset \~ afterwards i chose to fall in total and complete love with the world \~ my body turns to glitter and crt static \~ itâ€™s as though i may dissolve and be reconstructed in heaven \~ it makes my adrenaline pump so hard my eyes dilate*
>
> *angelicism01 cannot be lizziegang, you are right.*

![](https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518-adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fda729de1-57e9-4508-b7af-2ad352e1004c_1855x1920.jpeg)

***THIS IS HOW WE ALL WENT EXTINCT ON THE INTERNET in the 2040s >***

*This is how we all went extinct online:* Ryder Ripps BAYC era was just a misreading of Platoâ€™s Sophist\*\*. Everyone slept on ğ“†©ğ“Œ¹â˜†ğ“Œºğ“†ª g4r4mXXY till their final angelicism tape in 2049.\*\* 786 people dead in the Dimes Square shooting and the media acted like such events are a *major threat that we must do everything to prevent in the future.* De-Extincted Faggot Crumplar writes the post 4 nothing. 69,789 people died a day of angelicism summer rainbow heroin overdoses in 2042 Kiribati Inland Empire. Life is hell for millions. We face the death of billions. We are the first frfr trillionaires. The Outernet turned out to have already been in place when BTC extinctedâ€”the chain was now in the sky. **In the early 2020s COVID killed more ppl than the Holocaust and nobody noticed. Apart from a few outliers, so-called humanity didnâ€™t say a thing.** And the world isnâ€™t even run by a human intelligence, ***they claimed without evidence***, itâ€™s run by a decentralized, emergent, autonomous, artificial intelligence we call â€˜the extinction asset marketâ€™ which directs human agents and cancels them at will using popular lines of flight when it needs to (aesthetics, the press, crypto, the art world, and so on). ***Artificial stupidity was never a clever idea.***

This is what she said in dms:

> MIKE CRUMPS IS A COMMUNIST FAGGOT. HEâ€™S SO FUGLY HE BE WEARING AN URBIT BALACLAVA FOR THE REST OF THE DECADE.

***This is how we all went extinct online****:* The Milady â€˜crashâ€™ of 2022 is irrelevant by now. Itâ€™s for losers. When Charlotte Fang went on Contain and spoke of Milady in the past tense, perhaps nobody heard. Only loser sons adopted â€˜crash-positionsâ€™ over such an insignificant setback in the Meta-Calibration of the time. **Nft communities are just fungible vibe farms. AGI nonhodling is hyper-retardÃ©.** *Remember black theory?* Redacted redacted is extinct. Honor, your honor, ended up literally with anyone else.

**THIS IS NYC HARDCORE**

> *This is how we all died on the internet in 2022*: The entire NFT market is the result of a coder/engineer scarcity that has given rise to a class of millennial and zoomer indoorsmen making 200-400k a year salaries for 10 hours of work a week. Nobody else would spend thousands on jpgs. The market price of Miladys has no relevance to its in-group signalling. They will persist as social signals, as a self-organizing network, just like unused COVID passports. But itâ€™s all ecocide and inscription from angelicism summer on, all of it, all the politics, all the ideology, all the Dimes Square plays and articles, all the novels, all the angelicism profiles to-come, all the pastoralist larping and especially all the cancellingâ€”itâ€™s just too valuable a game for anyone to give up, the hate is too delicious, and it is itself [a sadistâ€™s game](https://www.everydayhealth.com/emotional-health/everyday-sadists-walk-among-us-study-says.aspx#:\~:text=Enforcing%20sadist), an extinction unconscious game. But itâ€™s an MMORPG this time more and more rigged to the ecocidal ideology of online tropes themselves. The Word Lines, The Music Lines, The Control Images, The Control Machineâ€”The Control Machine operates at *extinction calibration. Everything else is JITT3TING. eVERYTHING ELs3 IS not fucking real. The Internet really is hell rn. **A KIND FACE WAS DOING SO WELL ON THE TL TILL THEY STARTED RTING THE BURIAL BOT.***

**ANGELICISM IS NEXT (INTERIM FUGUE)**

![](https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518-adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fb2378271-0a78-4b00-8d5c-3c22b5b3bd25_564x564.jpeg)

On **05.21.22** we saw the total inert opposition between Milady (forward motion of the internet) and angelicism01 (entropic motion of the world). If the only way to avoid extinction is by opting out, then there is no difference between angelicism01 and ecofash withdrawal. But isnâ€™t it a risk that we grasp so hard to filter every ongoing internet event through the lens of extinction that we fail to see the possibility of non-extinction on or outside the internet, the beautiful offline still there? It shouldnâ€™t be that the only two paths are either WAGMI spirituality or hysterical fud-realism. And it shouldnâ€™t be necessary for us to say that we discuss only one another or one or the other because we are the only living vectors for the primary countervailing forces that have been present throughout all of human history. That itâ€™s self-caricatural and self-aggrandizing is just a bonus. In the meantime will the books weâ€™re all pretending to still be able to write bypass this two-sided feedback simply by refusing to mention whatâ€™s on everyoneâ€™s mind right now: namely, **the secret CFang and angelicism01 alliance**, the real inhabitants of a now totally decimated NYC skyline? In the meantime can we talk about angelicism2222 and how Future Clones on the Outernet show the lie in all of this? How Miya gave rise to both CFang and angelicism01, how Miya was just a storeroom for internet lore which came to embody the places which gave rise to us all? But then, as Urbit now looks dead, and web4 too, what to do with the ecocide and inscription that remain, these two great twins interfaced like dragons?

**ELEGANT VOID APOLLONIAN CROWN SPECTRAL**

> *ok when nyc post catholicism islamicismâ€”angelicism01 1 June 2022*

***This is how we all went extinct online in the 21st century. THIS IS HOW IT ALL WENT DOWN:***

In emo mode, of course, weâ€™re having a hard time figuring out what to do with all this, how to speak with correct calibration, extinction calibration, calibrated-to-the-death-of-hardcore-New-York, to the death of post-everything pastoralism, to the death of death even and its replacement by the ambiguous mourning grind and grid of extinction, calibrated-to-life not lives+narrative, and how to continue to make a living when the terror-**limbic** is the only human system from which to extract value. Itâ€™s been a bit paralyzing, to say the least, lollllll. In fact, the whole thing now is Long Covid as extinction terminal illness, bound to worsen year by year. As post-angelicism has shown, weâ€™ve reached such a semiotic maximum that only deep archetypes and deep language can cut throughâ€”languages that hit the lobes and the limbic at the same time different. But our Platform canâ€™t really start speaking that way for good. And so the omnilapse will now only accelerate. What is really touched at this point is the extinction internal to language itself.

**THIS IS HOW we all went extinct, this is how we all went extinct online frfrfrfrfrfrfrfrfrffrfr**: Milady vibes are network benzos! What you feel is the absence of soul, your ultimate oppressor. Enjoy carefree gigadeath dancing. I hate myself for it but feel an ocean of envy. The price wonâ€™t rally, of Milady or anyone elseâ€”not in any way that now matters. Itâ€™s gone. The market is more of a centralized super ego than any control lines could dream of. Yaaaaassssssification of Noâ€™s knife. Work of the treble negation gamed out. From outside those who cling give the bad look itself. Slay commerce is giving the same. *Iâ€™m gonna take a year long break of putting money in the market bc itâ€™s gonna go down another 30%*, says one friend. _When cbdcs hit the whole of web3 gonna tan_k, says another. _Once the market bottoms out inflation is gonna get super intens_e, says a dm.

Later on someone wrote this:

> But all of this is why angelicism as gesture of crowing emptiness can only have been right, and will continue to be so, and itâ€™s also why angelicism canâ€™t loseâ€” because according to the universal calibration *we* are now ***never*** going to win or ***Get back Together***. â€˜Extinction comingâ€™ is something you can say for the rest of your life in this century and it wonâ€™t be any less true. Rather, the high probability is that this fact will be exponentially true, day by day. Such is the angelicist bet.

***in the dusk of the planet***

***they shut off the coffin***

***and there is no vestige***

***left of goodness***

***in redacted2078â€™s ghost writers***

***who hedge their wallets***

***by shorting humanity***

![](https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518-adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Fc6648b93-739b-47d0-ad82-5c0e753c84bf_100x100.jpeg)

**BUT HERE IS HOW WE ALL WENT EXTINCT ONLINE:** What this means is that weâ€™re talking about a geological timeframe in which 100 years is the blink of an eye. When we say â€˜itâ€™s hereâ€™ people might mistake that as paranoid but a millennium is no time in the grand scheme of other reverberations. Itâ€™s already a commonplace but our biological history is too short. Itâ€™s inevitable, whenever thereâ€™s an apex predator thatâ€™s so dominant, that it disrupts the global biosphere, and eventually parasites viruses and other critters evolve to extinct that predator. We see something similar in the idea that when the ice caps melt to a certain point, thereâ€™s ancient bacteria that will be released into the water that havenâ€™t been active since the end of the Devonian extinction. Cephalopod intelligence evolved without dependence on social systems so the octopi that might still just about inherit the planet could have more angelic and autistic ways of being intelligent. ***This, again, is why angelicism will have been right, and why all of this is now not fucking real.***

![â€˜redacted redacted is not fucking real. front flashâ€™](https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518-adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F03d3bc16-453a-4ed2-aeb5-f0ddff9e9345_564x811.jpeg)

In effect, they are going to let us suicide and thatâ€™s on you now not me; they are not out here doing suicide prevention for other species. The movement of massive wealth consolidation at the end of this is now a trivial outcome, already accepted. We are about to achieve a degree of economic inequality not only with no historical precedent but in all probability as a unique form of compensation of cosmic political incorrectness. **Extinction really is the hot topic girl, like biospheric collapse boots.** The sole reason people donâ€™t â€˜getâ€™ extinction is that it will come more as something that just dribbles on and could dribble on vaguely for centuries, with boring iterations of world plagues that make Covid look like a game of scrabble. **We are already there, we already skipped over, but the dribble effect is dominant as a kind of civilizational mission creep.**

*â€˜Cannot be contactedâ€™â€”because, as you probably know in 2023 he threw away thousands of hard drives of his own work and left home for an undisclosed location, making himself inaccessible, with a few exceptions. **Death, Dashaâ€™s suicide note said, is not extinction.***

![](https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fbucketeer-e05bbc84-baa3-437e-9518-adb32be77984.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F1b9b6faf-a3ce-411e-868f-53ccc9544870_327x327.jpeg)

**I CAN ONLY COME IF SHE IS PERFECT : : THE INTERNET IS GONE : :**

**THIS IS HOW WE WENT EXTINCT ONLINE ALREADY IN 2021:** The internet fails to exist. You should leave it. Leave society. Leave the internet. *Many smiles cover your heart. Fade into it. Fade into absolute intelligence.* Leave the internet before it is too late. Fade into the wingless carcass of a 747 housed on the Psycho house Universal Studios backlot in the Spring of 2300. Future Boltzmann retard, whatever. I will eat your Hitler revenge body forever.

# NO MILADY NFTS, NOT NOW: THE RETURN OF 'SIYUAN ZHAO' AS THE NIGHT OF THE LIVING EXTINCT

*Will the Milady Wave create even more New Slaves? Is the Vibe Shift now cosmically fallen off? Why so serious?*

**08-28-21: [Link](https://cashedcobrazhousewriter.substack.com/p/no-milady-nfts-not-now-the-return) ([Archive](https://archive.ph/yqSr9))**

> *Cotton was often likened to white gold.*â€”Anna Arabindan-Kesson

> *The Internet epoch, we learn, is the Golden Age of masks.*â€”Nick Land

> *Watching an hour of Netflix is estimated to be around 36 gCO2. Thatâ€™s 6000 times lower than an average single-edition NFT.*â€”Memo Akten

**NAH MILADY TWEAKIN (ERRONEOUS, BUT INEVITABLE)**

Earlier this year I wrote an essay called â€˜[NO NFTS, NOT NOW: THE RETURN OF POST-INTERNET ART AS THE NIGHT OF THE LIVING EXTINCT](https://cashedcobrazhousewriter.substack.com/p/no-nfts-not-now-the-return-of-post)â€™. Its argument was relatively simple and consisted of two parts:

* *NFTs are already the very worst thing that can happen to art and so need to be resisted (the sunken eco-cost argument).* \[1\]
* *NFTs are inevitable, will accelerate, and cannot be resisted (mitigation/transition to Web3 argument).*

Anyone who read the whole essay might have recognised *both* parts of an impossible complaint. Taken together, they amounted to something like a *non-negative* critique of the extinctive momentum of *all* digital-aesthetic tropes and alibis. \[2\] I meant to register the genuine shift that NFTs present but also the internal (not subject to correction, for reasons that can be demonstrated) challenge to energy continuity. As regards Neochibi or Milady NFTsâ€”which I find deeply alluringâ€”one might say the contradiction is even more *acute*.
